promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive special gecko fighting-type pokemon with ancient scales. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ruinscale, a a massive special gecko fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Pump-up Smash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fighting" or "Ruinscale". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gecko-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Ruinscale, the Titan-Tail Pokemon. Known for inhabiting ancient constructs, it beefs up its slap with Pump-Up Smash for impressive defense.
